campaignInfo.title: The Mistaken Lands
campaignInfo.content: The second session of our campaign has now ended. Despite our best efforts I have to inform that all our unlikely heroes are still alive. This luck is probably not everlasting though. In this session our adventure continued with our heroes crossing the large mountains, constantly attacked by snow goblins. Wave after wave we repelled and ultimatly surviced the onslaught. Now exausted, hungry and unable to sleep we wait for the end.
